plot: After a prank gone wrong, Princess Lapis must undergo a long journey back home to the Diamond Palace. With her for this adventure are a young sprite, a directionally challenged immortal, and her math tutor. Armed with the powerful magic eraser, and an unmatched love of pudding, Lapis continues forth righting the injustices of the world and defeating magical foes.
opening_theme: "Chocolat au Lait" (ショコラ・オ・レ) by Yuki Matsuura
ending_theme: "Tenshi no Oheso" (天使のおへそ) by Yuko Miyamura and Mika Kanai
